page.title: 03A day in my life.
page.content: I wake up when the sun shines through the window and that is about half past seven. Then my Dad goes to make a cup of tea and bring biscuits for Tim and me. Afterwards we all have breakfast which is a Weetabix and a drink of apple juice. Usually we go to school in a car. Sometimes we walk in summer, but I don,t like it.My favourite lesson is reading about true things. At play time I enjoy playing wall ball with my friends.After school on Thursdays I go to Wakefield Harriers.I go there to improve my sprinting.Afterwards I am very tired so I go in the jacuzzi,then to bed and straight to sleep.
